title: The Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) is available in these colors
content:
Apple has finally revealed the iPad Air 5 (2022) — which had been rumored for months. Expectedly, this middle-range tablet has the same exterior design of the previous-gen model. The company completely overhauled the exterior of the iPad Air 4 (2020), and these changes typically occur once every few years. As a result, this release

The post The Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) is available in these colors appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has finally unveiled the iPad Air 5 for 2022, and it comes in a range of beautiful colors. Here are all the options.
